sentences.sContent: The result was correspondent with my wishes.
sentences.sContent_eng: The result was correspondent with my wishes.
sentences.sCn: 结果与我的愿望是一致的。

synos.tran: 通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行

phrases.pCn: 往来行；代理银行；通汇银行
报社派驻国外的通讯记者

remMethod.val: cor(共同的) + respond(反应) + ent(…的) → 有共同反应 → 一致的， 符合的

words.tran: 相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的

trans.tranCn: 通讯员，记者；异地代理商；代理银行
trans.tranOther: someone who is employed by a newspaper or a television station etc to report news from a particular area or on a particular subject
